data.title: 7 teams with the most Community shield triumphs
data.meta_description: The most successful cubs in FA community shield history
data.text:
The most successful cubs in FA community shield history

The FA Community Shield, often seen as a curtain-raiser for the English football season, has a rich history and showcases the best of English football.

The trophy, awarded annually to the winners of the Premier League and the FA Cup, reflects a club's consistent success and dominance in English football.

Here’s a look at the clubs with the most Community Shield titles, highlighting their historic achievements and contributions to the game.

Follow Pulse Sports Kenya for more updates

1. Manchester United - 21 Titles

Manchester United stands proudly at the top of the Community Shield winners' list, with an impressive 21 titles. This record underscores the club’s historical dominance in English football. Their first victory came in 1908, and their most recent win was in 2016-17 under José Mourinho. The Red Devils’ unparalleled success in the Community Shield complements their numerous league titles and FA Cups, cementing their status as one of England’s footballing giants.

2. Arsenal - 17 Titles

Arsenal, with 17 Community Shield victories, is the second-most successful club in the history of the competition. The Gunners have a storied history in English football, marked by their strong performances in domestic cups. Arsenal’s success in the Community Shield reflects their enduring competitiveness and ability to secure silverware. Their latest triumph came in the 2023 season, when they defeated Manchester City on penalties.

3. Liverpool - 16 Titles

Liverpool, another of England’s footballing powerhouses, has won the Community Shield 16 times. Known for their rich history and success in both domestic and European competitions, Liverpool's Community Shield victories add to their storied legacy. Their most recent win came in 2022 when they defeated Manchester City 3-1. Liverpool’s consistent performances across various competitions underscore their historical significance in English football.

4. Everton - 9 Titles

Everton, with 9 Community Shield wins, holds a prestigious place in English football history. The Merseyside club was a dominant force in English football during their heyday. Their last Community Shield victory came in 1995-96, and while recent years have been challenging, Everton's past achievements remain a testament to their historical significance.

5. Tottenham Hotspur - 7 Titles

Tottenham Hotspur, despite recent trophy droughts, has won the Community Shield 7 times. The North London club enjoyed significant success in the past, with their last Community Shield win dating back to 1991-92. Tottenham’s historical achievements in this competition highlight their previous successes and add to their rich footballing heritage.

6. Manchester City - 6 Titles

Manchester City has established itself as a dominant force in English football in recent years, with 6 Community Shield victories. The club’s modern era of success began with their takeover and has continued with multiple Premier League titles and domestic cups. Their most recent Community Shield win was in the 2019-20 season, reflecting their ongoing competitive edge.

7. Chelsea - 4 Titles

Chelsea, with 4 Community Shield wins, is among the elite clubs in English football. The London club’s rise to prominence began in the early 2000s following Roman Abramovich’s takeover. Their most recent Community Shield victory came in the 2009-10 season under Carlo Ancelotti. Chelsea’s achievements in this competition reflect their successful modern era and growing footballing legacy.

The FA Community Shield not only celebrates the champions of English football but also reflects the historical success and enduring legacy of these elite clubs.

From Manchester United's record-breaking 21 titles to Chelsea's recent successes, the Community Shield continues to be a prestigious and cherished trophy in English football.
